description: Heartbeat response provided to a CBSD

___grantId.description: Unique designator for the grant as passed in the heartbeat request.

$eref.description: Operational parameters provided for a CBSD

___maxEirp.description: The peak operating power in dBm/MHz to be used by the CBSD within this operating parameter set

___cbsdId.description: Unique designator for the CBSD as passed in the heartbeat request.

___transmitExpireTime.description: An RFC3339-formatted string indicating the time the CBSD can transmit until.

___responseData.description: Additional response-dependent structured data containing more information about an error.

___responseCode.description: An integer indicating the type of the response. 0 means success (no error)

___responseMessage.description: A detailed human-readable string describing the response.

$eref.description: Measurement report configuration parameters. Indicates to a CBSD which spectrum measurement the SAS wishes it to perform.

___grantExpireTime.description: An RFC3339-formatted string indicating the expiry time of the CBSD grant.

___heartbeatInterval.description: If present, the CBSD is required to use the indicated heartbeat interval in subsequent heartbeat requests.
